channel.title: Need help with added items
channel.description:
i got this error in my server... it is silab and i added everything well, its phonescape base...
[code]Starting PhoneScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49833 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: client.<init>(Ljava/ net/Socket;I)V at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:150) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] help me please.... and fast please..... [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2007, 02:34:34 PM[/size][hr]and it gives this error in the client:
No response from server blah blah blah thingy

item.title: Need help with added items

i got this error in my server… it is silab and i added everything well, its phonescape base…

Starting PhoneScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49833 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: client.<init>(Ljava/ net/Socket;I)V at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:150) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
